001.comments: NOT OFFERED 2020W.If this section if FULL or BLOCKED please sign up for the corresponding wait list section - THTR 452, Section WL1. Once you have registered in the wait list there is no need to contact the Department. Your registration will be switched to the parent section when space becomes available. Preference may be given to Majors, Minors, or Honours students in Theatre or Film. For more information about Department of Theatre and Film wait lists please visit: http://theatrefilm.ubc.ca/undergraduate/undergraduate-courses/how-to-wait-list-a-course/ NOTE: This course is crosslisted with THTR 352. If this section is full DO NOT register in THTR 352. Contact the department so seats can be adjusted for t and ~he correct course.

WL1.comments: This is a WAIT LIST section for THTR 452, Section 001. Once you have registered in the wait list there is no need to contact the Department. Your registration will be switched to the parent section when space becomes available. Preference may be given to Majors, Minors, or Honours students in Theatre or Film. For more information about Department of Theatre and Film wait lists please visit: http://theatrefilm.ubc.ca/undergraduate/undergraduate-courses/how-to-wait-list-a-course/
